TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit FileSystemSecurity extends System.Security.AccessControl.NativeObjectSecurity
Public MustInherit Class FileSystemSecurity Inherits NativeObjectSecurity

summary.span: 表示文件或目录的访问控制和审核安全。

span.span: Represents the access control and audit security for a file or directory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是类的基类和类。The class is the base class for the and classes. 这些类表示所有系统文件或目录的访问权限，并定义如何审核访问尝试。These classes represent all of the access rights for a system file or directory and define how access attempts are audited. 类访问和审核权限表示为一组规则。The class represents access and audit rights as a set of rules. 表示每个访问规则对象，而表示每个审核规则对象。Each access rule is represented by a object, while each audit rule is represented by a object. 类是抽象的基础的 Microsoft Windows 文件安全系统。The class is an abstraction of the underlying Microsoft Windows file security system. 在此系统中，每个文件或目录具有随机访问控制列表 (DACL)，它控制对文件或目录的访问和系统访问控制列表 (SACL)，指定要审核的访问控制尝试。In this system, each file or directory has a discretionary access control list (DACL), which controls access to the file or directory, and a system access control list (SACL), which specifies the access control attempts that are audited. 和类是抽象的访问控制项 (Ace) 构成的 Dacl 和 Sacl。The and classes are abstractions of access control entries (ACEs) that comprise DACLs and SACLs. 类隐藏许多 Dacl 和 Sacl 的详细信息; 无需担心 ACE 排序或 null DACL。The class hides many of details of DACLs and SACLs; you do not have to worry about ACE ordering or null DACLS. 若要持久保存到文件的新的或更改访问控制列表 (ACL) 信息，请使用或方法。To persist new or changed access control list (ACL) information to a file, use the or method. 若要新建或更改 ACL 将信息保存到一个目录，请使用或方法。To persist new or changed ACL information to a directory, use the or method. 若要从文件检索 ACL 的信息，请使用或方法。To retrieve ACL information from a file, use the or method. 若要从目录中检索 ACL 的信息，请使用或方法。To retrieve ACL information from a directory, use the or method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用类来添加，然后从文件删除访问控制列表 (ACL) 项。The following code example uses the class to add and then remove an access control list (ACL) entry from a file. 你必须提供有效的用户或组帐户以运行此示例。You must supply a valid user or group account to run this example. [!code-cpp[IO.File.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IO.File.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl/cpp/sample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IO.File.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IO.File.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IO.File.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/IO.File.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl/VB/sample.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property AccessRightType As Type
public: virtual property Type ^ AccessRightType { Type ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取 类用于表示访问规则的枚举。

span.span: Gets the enumeration that the class uses to represent access rights.

value.span: 一个 对象，表示 枚举。

span.span: A object representing the enumeration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 派生的类类重写属性，并返回它们用于表示访问权限的类型。Classes that derive from the class override the property and return the type they use to represent access rights. 数组或包含多个类型的安全对象的集合时，使用此属性来确定要使用每个安全对象的正确的枚举类型。When you work with arrays or collections that contain multiple types of security objects, use this property to determine the correct enumeration type to use with each security object.

MemberSignature.Value: public override sealed System.Security.AccessControl.AccessRule AccessRuleFactory (System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference identityReference, int accessMask, bool isInherited, System.Security.AccessControl.InheritanceFlags inheritanceFlags, System.Security.AccessControl.PropagationFlags propagationFlags, System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType type);

summary.span: 使用指定的访问权限、访问控制和标志初始化 类的新实例，该实例表示指定用户的新的访问控制规则。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that represents a new access control rule for the specified user, with the specified access rights, access control, and flags.

returns.span: 表示指定用户的新访问控制规则的新的 对象，具有指定的访问权限、访问控制和标志。

span.span: A new object that represents a new access control rule for the specified user, with the specified access rights, access control, and flags.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建访问控制规则的建议的方法是使用的构造函数类。The recommended way to create access control rules is to use the constructors of the class. 返回类型方法是基类， ，但返回的值可以安全地强制转换为派生类。The return type of the method is the base class, , but the return value can be cast safely to the derived class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void AddAccessRule(class System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAccessRule rule) cil managed

param.name: rule
param.span: 一个 对象，表示要添加到文件或目录的访问控制列表 (ACL) 权限。

span.span: A object that represents an access control list (ACL) permission to add to a file or directory.

summary.span: 将指定的访问控制列表 (ACL) 权限添加到当前文件或目录。

span.span: Adds the specified access control list (ACL) permission to the current file or directory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将新规则添加到列表中包含的规则对象。The method adds a new rule to the list of rules contained within a object. 如果已存在指定的规则的访问控制列表 (ACL)方法仍将添加的规则，有一个例外：对象创建使用枚举值将取代使用创建的对象枚举值。If an access control list (ACL) already exists for the specified rule, the method will still add the rule, with one exception: a object created using the enumeration value supersedes an object created using the enumeration value. 若要新建或更改 ACL 将信息保存到一个文件，请使用或方法。To persist new or changed ACL information to a file, use the or method. 若要新建或更改 ACL 将信息保存到一个目录，请使用或方法。To persist new or changed ACL information to a directory, use the or method. 若要从文件检索 ACL 的信息，请使用或方法。To retrieve ACL information from a file, use the or method. 若要从目录中检索 ACL 的信息，请使用或方法。To retrieve ACL information from a directory, use the or method. 如果没有设置访问规则添加当标志，标志将自动添加到你的规则。When you add an access rule without setting the flag, the flag will be automatically added to your rule. 如果您删除该规则更高版本而无需指定标志，该标志将自动删除。If you remove the rule later without specifying the flag, the flag will automatically be removed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用类来添加，然后从文件删除访问控制列表 (ACL) 项。The following code example uses the class to add and then remove an access control list (ACL) entry from a file. 你必须提供有效的用户或组帐户以运行此示例。You must supply a valid user or group account to run this example. [!code-cpp[IO.File.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IO.File.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl/cpp/sample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IO.File.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IO.File.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IO.File.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/IO.File.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl/VB/sample.vb#1)]

span.span: Adds the specified audit rule to the current file or directory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将新的审核规则添加到列表中包含的规则对象。The method adds a new audit rule to the list of rules contained within a object. 如果审核规则已存在指定的规则，方法仍将添加规则。If an audit rule already exists for the specified rule, the method will still add the rule. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用方法将审核规则添加到文件，然后使用方法以从文件中删除的审核规则。The following code example uses the method to add an audit rule to a file and uses the method to remove the audit rule from the file. 你必须提供有效的用户或组帐户以运行此示例。You must supply a valid user or group account to run this example. [!code-csharp[AccessControl.FileSystemAuditRule#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AccessControl.FileSystemAuditRule/cs/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AccessControl.FileSystemAuditRule#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AccessControl.FileSystemAuditRule/vb/sample.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool RemoveAccessRule(class System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAccessRule rule) cil managed
Public Function RemoveAccessRule (rule As FileSystemAccessRule) As Boolean

param.name: rule
param.span: 一个 对象，表示要从文件或目录中移除的访问控制列表 (ACL) 权限。

span.span: A object that represents an access control list (ACL) permission to remove from a file or directory.

summary.span: 从当前文件或目录移除所有匹配的允许或拒绝访问控制列表 (ACL) 权限。

span.span: Removes all matching allow or deny access control list (ACL) permissions from the current file or directory.

returns.span: 如果访问规则已移除，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the access rule was removed; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法移除所有匹配访问规则或所有匹配访问规则从当前对象。The method removes either all matching access rules or all matching access rules from the current object. 例如，可以使用此方法中删除所有表示通过访问用户的规则对象创建使用值，值和用户帐户。For example, you can use this method to remove all access rules for a user by passing a object created using the value, the value, and a user account. 当您这样做时，方法中删除指定任何拒绝规则值或值。When you do this, the method removes any deny rules that specify the value or the value. 若要持久保存到文件的新的或更改访问控制列表 (ACL) 信息，请使用或方法。To persist new or changed access control list (ACL) information to a file, use the or method. 若要新建或更改 ACL 将信息保存到一个目录，请使用或方法。To persist new or changed ACL information to a directory, use the or method. 若要从文件检索 ACL 的信息，请使用或方法。To retrieve ACL information from a file, use the or method. 若要从目录中检索 ACL 的信息，请使用或方法。To retrieve ACL information from a directory, use the or method. 如果没有设置访问规则添加当标志，标志将自动添加到你的规则。When you add an access rule without setting the flag, the flag will be automatically added to your rule. 如果您删除该规则更高版本而无需指定标志，该标志将自动删除。If you remove the rule later without specifying the flag, the flag will automatically be removed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用类来添加，然后从文件删除访问控制列表 (ACL) 项。The following code example uses the class to add and then remove an access control list (ACL) entry from a file. 你必须提供有效的用户或组帐户以运行此示例。You must supply a valid user or group account to run this example. [!code-cpp[IO.File.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IO.File.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl/cpp/sample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IO.File.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IO.File.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IO.File.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/IO.File.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl/VB/sample.vb#1)]

span.span: Removes all access control list (ACL) permissions for the specified user from the current file or directory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法中删除指定的用户的所有访问控制列表 (ACL) 权限。The method removes all access control list (ACL) permissions for the specified user. 该方法忽略中的所有值对象，除非用户帐户。The method ignores all values in the object except the user account. 若要新建或更改 ACL 将信息保存到一个文件，请使用或方法。To persist new or changed ACL information to a file, use the or method. 若要新建或更改 ACL 将信息保存到一个目录，请使用或方法。To persist new or changed ACL information to a directory, use the or method. 若要从文件检索 ACL 的信息，请使用或方法。To retrieve ACL information from a file, use the or method. 若要从目录中检索 ACL 的信息，请使用或方法。To retrieve ACL information from a directory, use the or method. 如果没有设置访问规则添加当标志，标志将自动添加到你的规则。When you add an access rule without setting the flag, the flag will be automatically added to your rule. 如果您删除该规则更高版本而无需指定标志，该标志将自动删除。If you remove the rule later without specifying the flag, the flag will automatically be removed.

span.span: The parameter is .

summary.span: 从当前文件或目录移除单个匹配的允许或拒绝访问控制列表 (ACL) 权限。

span.span: Removes a single matching allow or deny access control list (ACL) permission from the current file or directory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法移除指定访问规则或指定的匹配从当前的访问规则对象。The method removes the specified access rule or the specified matching access rule from the current object. 例如，可以使用此方法移除指定通过将传递用户访问规则对象创建使用值，值和用户帐户。For example, you can use this method to remove a specified access rule for a user by passing a object created using the value, the value, and a user account. 当您这样做时，方法中删除指定的拒绝规则值。When you do this, the method removes only the deny rule that specifies the value. 它不会删除任何指定的拒绝规则值。It does not remove any deny rules that specify the value. 若要持久保存到文件的新的或更改访问控制列表 (ACL) 信息，请使用或方法。To persist new or changed access control list (ACL) information to a file, use the or method. 若要新建或更改 ACL 将信息保存到一个目录，请使用或方法。To persist new or changed ACL information to a directory, use the or method. 若要从文件检索 ACL 的信息，请使用或方法。To retrieve ACL information from a file, use the or method. 若要从目录中检索 ACL 的信息，请使用或方法。To retrieve ACL information from a directory, use the or method. 如果没有设置访问规则添加当标志，标志将自动添加到你的规则。When you add an access rule without setting the flag, the flag will be automatically added to your rule. 如果您删除该规则更高版本而无需指定标志，该标志将自动删除。If you remove the rule later without specifying the flag, the flag will automatically be removed.

returns.span: 如果审核规则已移除，则为 ；否则为

span.span: if the audit rule was removed; otherwise,

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法移除所有匹配审核规则或所有匹配审核规则从当前对象。The method removes either all matching audit rules or all matching audit rules from the current object. 例如，可以使用此方法中删除所有审核规则的用户通过传递对象创建使用值，值和用户帐户。For example, you can use this method to remove all audit rules for a user by passing a object created using the value, the value, and a user account. 当您这样做时，方法中删除指定任何拒绝规则值或值。When you do this, the method removes any deny rules that specify the value or the value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用方法将审核规则添加到文件，然后使用方法以从文件中删除的审核规则。The following code example uses the method to add an audit rule to a file and uses the method to remove the audit rule from the file. 你必须提供有效的用户或组帐户以运行此示例。You must supply a valid user or group account to run this example. [!code-csharp[AccessControl.FileSystemAuditRule#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AccessControl.FileSystemAuditRule/cs/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AccessControl.FileSystemAuditRule#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AccessControl.FileSystemAuditRule/vb/sample.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void RemoveAuditRuleAll(class System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAuditRule rule) cil managed

param.name: rule
param.span: 一个 对象，该对象指定应该从文件或目录删除其审核规则的用户。

span.span: A object that specifies a user whose audit rules should be removed from a file or directory.

summary.span: 从当前文件或目录移除指定用户的所有审核规则。

span.span: Removes all audit rules for the specified user from the current file or directory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法移除指定的用户的所有审核规则。The method removes all audit rules for the specified user. 它会忽略中的所有值对象，除非用户帐户。It ignores all values in the object except the user account.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void RemoveAuditRuleSpecific(class System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAuditRule rule) cil managed

param.name: rule
param.span: 一个 对象，表示要从文件或目录移除的审核规则。

span.span: A object that represents an audit rule to remove from a file or directory.

summary.span: 从当前文件或目录移除单个匹配的允许或拒绝审核规则。

span.span: Removes a single matching allow or deny audit rule from the current file or directory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法移除指定的匹配审核规则或指定的匹配从当前的审核规则对象。The method removes the specified matching audit rule or the specified matching audit rule from the current object. 例如，可以使用此方法移除指定通过将传递用户审核规则对象创建使用值，值和用户帐户。For example, you can use this method to remove a specified audit rule for a user by passing a object created using the value, the value, and a user account. 当您这样做时，方法中删除指定的拒绝规则值。When you do this, the method removes only a deny rule that specifies the value. 它不会删除任何指定的拒绝规则值。It does not remove any deny rules that specify the value.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ResetAccessRule(class System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAccessRule rule) cil managed

param.name: rule
param.span: 一个 对象，表示要添加到文件或目录的访问控制列表 (ACL) 权限。

span.span: A object that represents an access control list (ACL) permission to add to a file or directory.

summary.span: 将指定的访问控制列表 (ACL) 权限添加到当前文件或目录，并移除所有匹配的 ACL 权限。

span.span: Adds the specified access control list (ACL) permission to the current file or directory and removes all matching ACL permissions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法添加指定的访问控制列表 (ACL) 规则或覆盖匹配所有相同 ACL 规则`rule`参数。The method adds the specified access control list (ACL) rule or overwrites any identical ACL rules that match the `rule` parameter. 例如，如果`rule`参数指定值和方法将查找指定的相同 ACL 规则值，则相同的规则将被覆盖。For example, if the `rule` parameter specifies a value and the method finds an identical ACL rule that specifies the value, the identical rule will be overwritten. 如果方法查找指定的相同 ACL 规则值完全相同的规则也将被覆盖。If the method finds an identical ACL rule that specifies the value, the identical rule will also be overwritten. 若要新建或更改 ACL 将信息保存到一个文件，请使用或方法。To persist new or changed ACL information to a file, use the or method. 若要新建或更改 ACL 将信息保存到一个目录，请使用或方法。To persist new or changed ACL information to a directory, use the or method. 若要从文件检索 ACL 的信息，请使用或方法。To retrieve ACL information from a file, use the or method. 若要从目录中检索 ACL 的信息，请使用或方法。To retrieve ACL information from a directory, use the or method.

param.name: rule
param.span: 一个 对象，表示要为文件或目录设置的访问控制列表 (ACL) 权限。

span.span: A object that represents an access control list (ACL) permission to set for a file or directory.

summary.span: 设置当前文件或目录的指定访问控制列表 (ACL) 权限。

span.span: Sets the specified access control list (ACL) permission for the current file or directory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法添加指定的访问控制列表 (ACL) 规则或覆盖匹配所有相同 ACL 规则的值`rule`参数。The method adds the specified access control list (ACL) rule or overwrites any identical ACL rules that match the value of the `rule` parameter. 例如，如果`rule`参数指定值和方法将查找指定的相同 ACL 规则值，则相同的规则将被覆盖。For example, if the `rule` parameter specifies a value and the method finds an identical ACL rule that specifies the value, the identical rule will be overwritten. 如果方法查找指定的相同 ACL 规则值完全相同的规则不会被覆盖。If the method finds an identical ACL rule that specifies the value, the identical rule will not be overwritten. 若要新建或更改 ACL 将信息保存到一个文件，请使用或方法。To persist new or changed ACL information to a file, use the or method. 若要新建或更改 ACL 将信息保存到一个目录，请使用或方法。To persist new or changed ACL information to a directory, use the or method. 若要从文件检索 ACL 的信息，请使用或方法。To retrieve ACL information from a file, use the or method. 若要从目录中检索 ACL 的信息，请使用或方法。To retrieve ACL information from a directory, use the or method.

span.span: A object that represents an audit rule to set for a file or directory.

span.span: Sets the specified audit rule for the current file or directory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法添加指定的审核规则或覆盖与匹配任何相同的审核规则的值`rule`参数。The method adds the specified audit rule or overwrites any identical audit rules that match the value of the `rule` parameter. 例如，如果`rule`参数指定值和方法将查找指定的相同的审核规则值，则相同的规则将被覆盖。For example, if the `rule` parameter specifies a value and the method finds an identical audit rule that specifies the value, the identical rule will be overwritten. 如果方法查找指定的相同的审核规则值完全相同的规则不会被覆盖。If the method finds an identical audit rule that specifies the value, the identical rule will not be overwritten.
